description:
This 6 module course is more of an introductory orientation course which will give you a fairly in depth view of some of the fundamentals of Personal Financial Planning and is purposely pitched at an Elementary Level.

If you have already viewed the Introductory Video, available in the top left corner, then you will have a fairly good idea of the course content and objectives.

Should you find that, after completing this course you would like to delve deeper into the complexities of this area of personal finance, then we would suggest that you consider enrolling for our Intermediate Level Course: Financial Planning Demystified.
title: Financial Planning - Exploring the Basics
